敝.definition: my (polite); poor; ruined; shabby; worn out; defeated

敝屣尊榮.definition: to care nothing for worldly fame and glory (idiom)

敝帚千金.definition: lit. my worn-out broom, a thousand in gold (idiom); fig. sentimental value; I wouldn't be parted with it for anything.

敝帚自珍.definition: to value the broom as one's own (idiom); to attach value to sth because it is one's own; a sentimental attachment
